Robert Casey Lafferty

I am a master's student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying Computer Science. I also have a Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science from Kansas State University, where I focused my studies on cyber security and video game development. I am a co-founder of the UNL Game Development Club and researching educational game development/gamification as my master's thesis.


My interests include software development, game development, cyber security, artificial intelligence, web development, and more.
